page.title: 20Employment
page.content: The major employer in Teesdale Is the pharmaceutical giant Glaxo's Barnard Castle factory.Such dependance on a single employer cannot be the best thing for an area whose history of employment has been that of the small family farm supplemented by part-time employment in the mineral extractive industry.The way forward is probably through a major expansion in service industry(Tourism)backed up by an increase in forestry work and a move towards adding value to the products of Teesdale's agricultural industry by more processing of food products on the spot.A promotion of greater awareness among the local population of the cash value to the local economy of the assets of landscape and amenity which they take for granted would do much to generate the employment to keep the area alive.
